sentences.en: Accompanying the biochemical, metabolic, and visceral changes are a series of endocrine alterations.
sentences.cn: 在生化 、 代谢以及内脏发生变化的同时,还有一系列的内分泌变化.

sentences.en: Adaptive strategies may often evolve, such as the biochemical polymorphisms of blood and serum groups.
sentences.cn: 适应策略也常常进化, 例如:血型和血清的生化多形现象就是这样的.

sentences.en: Carbohydrates are one of the four major classes of biochemical molecules.
sentences.cn: 碳水化合物是四大类生物化学分子中的一类.

sentences.en: Carbonate sediments in all environments are basically products of an ancient biochemical system.
sentences.cn: 一切环境的碳酸盐沉积物,基本上都是古代生物化学体系的产物.

sentences.en: Firm liver enlargement and biochemical evidence of intrahepatic cholestasis are typical manifestations.
sentences.cn: 肝硬而肿大和肝内胆汁淤沸的生化改变是典型现象.

sentences.en: Liver functions, Blood Glucose, Blood fatty and uric acid biochemical examination.
sentences.cn: 肝功能,血糖, 血脂肪,肾功能, 尿酸等血液生化检查.

sentences.en: PET images illuminate the cancer cells and can see time biochemical functions.
sentences.cn: 探头称为脱氧葡萄糖,PET显像照亮了癌细胞,可以看到实时生化功能.

sentences.en: Physiological and biochemical effects of Hg ~ ( 2 + ) of Egeria najas were tested.
sentences.cn: 研究了不同浓度Hg2+对细叶蜈蚣草(Egerianajas)叶绿素(Chl ) 、超氧化物歧化酶(SOD)和过氧氢酶(CAT) 的分子毒理学效应.

sentences.en: Starvation brings biochemical changes in the body.
sentences.cn: 饥饿引起体内的生化变化。

sentences.en: Temperature governs the rate of all biochemical processes.
sentences.cn: 温度决定着一切生物化学过程的速度.

sentences.en: That , in turn, suggests what their biochemical functions may be -- and how best to shut them down.
sentences.cn: 接着, 提出这些蛋白质的生物化学功能可能是 什么样 ,以及如何在最佳时机关闭它们.

sentences.en: The biochemical era in the study of gastrin was initiated.
sentences.cn: 研究促胃液素的生物化学时代开始了.

sentences.en: The other curve shown in Fig 1.5 corresponds to the biochemical oxygen demand ( BOD ).
sentences.cn: 图1-5的另一曲线相当于生化需氧量 ( BOD ) 曲线.

sentences.en: The patients'biochemical response to ursodeoxycholic acid means a normal life expectancy.
sentences.cn: 患者对熊去氧胆酸产生生化上的反应意味着正常的寿命预期.

sentences.en: This biochemical inhibition of feeding by animals or plants is called " allelopathy ".
sentences.cn: 这一生物化学上抑制动物或植物的取食被称谓 “ 他感作用 ”.

sentences.en: To promote or strengthen ( a biochemical or physiological action or effect ).
sentences.cn: 加强促进或加强 ( 生化或生理行为、效力 )

words.tran_cn: 生物气候学的；有关生物与气候的
[生化] 生物催化剂；生物触媒
生物芯片；生物集成电路片

phrases.tran_cn: 生化分析；生物技术分析；生物化学分析
生化需氧量（等于biological oxygen demand）
生物化学反应，生化反应

trans.tran_en: Biochemical changes, reactions, and mechanisms relate to the chemical processes that happen in living things
